title: Designing Effective Language Acquisition Strategies for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A supplementary learning environment enabled by digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can apply various instructional design theories to propose three or more language learning strategies
Learners can develop at least one language lesson design tailored to the cognitive characteristics of adult learners
Learners can analyze formative assessment results to improve instructional design at least twice
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
